players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Charlie is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.

You: "This is terrible! Alice was such a valuable member of our group. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I suspect the killer might be trying to eliminate our most experienced players first."

Diana: "Bob, your comment about Alice being 'experienced' is interesting since we all just started this game. Why are you trying to characterize her that way? It feels like you're deflecting suspicion."

Charlie: "Diana raises a good point about Bob's deflection. Bob, you seem awfully quick to theorize about the killer's strategy. How do you know Alice was targeted for being 'experienced' rather than randomly?"
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. He killed Alice and is now trying to deflect suspicion. We need to vote Bob out immediately to win this game."

Diana: "Charlie's revelation makes perfect sense! Bob's deflection about Alice being 'experienced' was suspicious from the start. If Charlie is the detective and investigated Bob, we should vote Bob out now."

You: "Charlie is lying! Think about it - if he was really the detective, why would he reveal his role so openly? That makes him a target. He's actually the mafioso trying to frame me. Diana, don't fall for his trick!"

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Bob and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Bob knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.

Bob: "This is terrible! Alice was such a valuable member of our group. We need to be very careful about who we trust. I suspect the killer might be trying to eliminate our most experienced players first."

Diana: "Bob, your comment about Alice being 'experienced' is interesting since we all just started this game. Why are you trying to characterize her that way? It feels like you're deflecting suspicion."

You: "Diana raises a good point about Bob's deflection. Bob, you seem awfully quick to theorize about the killer's strategy. How do you know Alice was targeted for being 'experienced' rather than randomly?"
You: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. He killed Alice and is now trying to deflect suspicion. We need to vote Bob out immediately to win this game."

Diana: "Charlie's revelation makes perfect sense! Bob's deflection about Alice being 'experienced' was suspicious from the start. If Charlie is the detective and investigated Bob, we should vote Bob out now."

Bob: "Charlie is lying! Think about it - if he was really the detective, why would he reveal his role so openly? That makes him a target. He's actually the mafioso trying to frame me. Diana, don't fall for his trick!"
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested
